name: graphml-schema-generator
description: A tool to generate TypeScript interfaces from graphml graphical files.

scripts.bump:patch: gulp prod && node build/release-patch && git add package.json && git commit -m"Bump patch version" && npm publish
scripts.bump:minor: gulp prod && node build/release-minor && git add package.json && git commit -m"Bump minor version" && npm publish
scripts.bump:major: gulp prod && node build/release-major && git add package.json && git commit -m"Bump major version" && npm publish

author: Gaston Ndanyuzwe <gaston.ndanyuzwe@infinteacacia.com>
